intro: Welcome user, to your very own adventure. This is not just any standard adventure; this is a choose your own adventure. Your story is what you make of it. Whether you want a story of action, saving people in distress, or a tale of doom where you shall meet an untimely demise. Whatever it may be there is one thing for certain, and that is every story has a beginning, a tutorial of sort to see if you are ready for an adventure like this. But be warned as soon as you turn your back, trace back your steps, its game over. Since adventure requires action, will you take the first step?
